name: Des-Colagem II
description:
"Ungluing I", collage on A-4 size cardboard.
Once I finish the collage, I let it dry and peel off whatever is possible, achieving unpredictable results through ungluing. Finally I photograph the original work in high quality for reproduction on synthetic paper in the desired size.
Cirlei Gonçalves is a designer, visual artist, clothing and accessories customizer and artisan. She lives and works in Curitiba/PR - Brazil
site : https://cirleiopart.wixsite.com/cirleigoncalves  twitter.com/tatibetatii     instagram.com/cirlei.op.art
